background: This protocol was developed to describe methods for determining effects of habitat actions on abundance of native summer steelhead in the Upper Grande Ronde River Subbasin.
title: Summer steelhead redd surveys for biomonitoring
assumptions: All redds constructed in the selected reaches are counted. Each redd is counted once and only once. Accurate redd/female factor is used. GPS coordinates are accurate.
objectives: Estimate the number of spawning females.
Estimate the numbers of native summer steelhead spawners over time.
